unnormalised: Hey everyone! So, I was chatting with Rohan the other day – he's prepping for his IIT-JEE, the poor guy – and we got onto the topic of studying. Rohan's struggling, bless his heart, because one-size-fits-all coaching classes just aren't cutting it. That got me thinking about adaptive learning.

unnormalised: Basically, adaptive learning uses technology to understand *exactly* what you know and what you don't. Remember those grueling R.D. Sharma maths textbooks? With adaptive learning platforms, you won't waste time re-hashing concepts you've already aced. Instead, the system throws problems at you that are *just* challenging enough to keep you engaged and learning.
